name: Hullo Dentist
description:
Warning: This game contains light horror elements!

You've got a customer, and he needs help making his teeth squeaky clean! Move around using the mouse cursor and click on a tooth to pull it. Be careful though, rotten teeth can contain unwanted surprises...

Clean all of the customer’s teeth to win!

-----------------

This game can be played in browser, or downloaded as an executable file for Windows.
